title: The Sinking home
creator_credit: Cameron Sugden, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Cam Sugden pays tribute to Mary, the matriarch of a poor Phillippino household in Manila. Despite living in a slum, Mary has endeavoured to create a large cocoon to protect her family. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.
creator_credit_for_label: Cameron Sugden, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
